;;;日本央行;;自2007年以来首次加息。隔夜贷款目标利率从负0.1%到零之间提高到零之间和 0.1%，使英国央行成为最后一个结束负利率政策的央行（它于 2016 年首次将利率降至零以下）。该银行还放弃了限制长期政府债券收益率的收益率曲线控制。几个月前就已经发出了方向改变的信号，但央行行长上田一夫表示，将维持“宽松的金融状况”。该银行每月仍将购买约 6 万日元（400 亿美元）的政府债券。

;;;美联储;;在会议上维持利率不变。投资者对美联储利率路径的“点阵图”更感兴趣，该图表明美联储仍预计今年将降息三个四分之一个百分点。市场飙升。

;;Reddit; 定价在纽约证券交易所上市前，其股价为 34 美元，这是其向投资者提交的价格范围的上限。该社交媒体平台的;首次公开募股;获得了严重超额认购。

;经过多年与英国引渡的抗争和十个月的努力被软禁的;迈克·林奇;在旧金山接受审判，罪名是他欺骗性地谎报了 Autonomy 的收入。Autonomy 是一家软件公司，他于 2011 年以 103 亿美元的价格卖给了惠普。 ;惠普;随后对其收购价值进行了巨额减记，并声称 Autonomy 创始人林奇先生欺骗了该公司。检方表示，这是硅谷历史上最大的欺诈案。林奇先生否认这一指控。他的辩护反驳说 ;HP; 对自治管理不当。

;;Third-party candidates could tip America's presidential election
;;< a href="https://www.economist.com/science-and-technology/2024/01/09/heart-attacks-strokes-dementia-can-biden-and-trump-beat-the-odds">;Heart attacks, strokes, dementia—can Biden and Trump beat the odds?

;;;KAL;'s cartoon appears weekly in The Economist. You can see last week's ;here;.;

; https://www.economist.com/the-world-this-week/2024/03/07/kals-cartoon /内容/o20dpfjs08gtiagbtri7s0jb29k240cn Thu, 07 Mar 2024 14:15:21 GMT 本周封面

;;E;;veryone wants; to know whether Donald Trump will return to白宫。然而很少有人了解将决定他是否当选的选举制度的复杂性。本周我们发布了详细的分析，不是针对可能影响投票的大趋势，而是针对今年竞选的特殊性。第三方候选人推翻关键摇摆州的可能性有多大？或者特朗普的刑事审判会动摇尚未做出决定的选民，或者激怒他的支持者？或者这个年龄会阻碍乔·拜登总统或他稍微年轻的竞争对手？ There could be big surprises between now and November.

;

;How to illustrate this?一个想法是让一名选民收到一个惊喜——在本例中，当他从投票站的一个洞里掉下来时，这是一个相当不愉快的惊喜。这个主题的一个变体是展示特朗普先生和拜登先生摇摇欲坠地站在从下面切割的地板上。读者只能猜测哪一个可能会突然跌倒。

;
;
;
;
;
;
;

;Nothing conjures up notions of “shock” and “act of God” better than lightning.因此，我们的设计团队还炮制了一道从高处击中总统讲台的闪电，象征着可能使一位候选人陷入困境的不幸事件。或者，既然我们正在谈论具有巨大后果的事情，我们可以展示白宫陷入黑洞吗？ Maybe this was a bit over the top.

;

;Since luck is involved—and one of the candidates used to run casinos—we toyed with a gambling theme.我们尝试将一叠牌面朝下展示，这样我们就看不出它们的好坏。仔细观察，可以看到特朗普的个人资料是共和党的红色，拜登的个人资料是民主党的蓝色。同样的想法可以用三个杯子和一个球来表达，就像在猜壳游戏中一样。然而，骗局通常是被操纵的，我们不想在选举中提出这样的建议。 Too many people distrust the voting machines already.

;

;What about a rabbit, ready to be plucked from a conjurer's hat?首先，我们用政治保险杠贴纸制作了它的耳朵。然后我们尝试画一只从投票箱中出来的兔子。这很可爱，但不太正确。我们所说的惊喜并不涉及魔法或诡计。

;

;The race is so close that something small could change the result.那么，一只蝴蝶弯曲一根带有星条旗的旗杆怎么样？ Some erudite colleagues quibbled that this is not how the “butterfly effect” works, but we developed it into a cover anyway.

;

;In the end, the image we liked best showed the two candidates setting off along a campaign trail strewn with banana skins.其中一个可能会滑倒，从而颠覆比赛。第一个设计，用的是普通香蕉，太安静了，所以我们的设计师让它更像波普艺术，让人想起安迪·沃霍尔为地下丝绒乐队做的专辑封面。唯一剩下的问题是香蕉太大了。 We asked the design team to do some “banana optimisation”—not an instruction they'd heard before—and the result was a very appealing cover.

;
;;;
;

;;T;;his is one; of those weeks that carves lines in our designers' brows and turns their knuckles white. That is because we have a dreaded triple bill of covers.

;

;In America, Europe, the Middle East and Africa we focus on the ;stockmarket's remarkable performance;. In Britain we introduce our new; build-a-voter tool;, which models the country's electorate. And in Asia we highlight ;India's north-south divide;.

;

;As usual, each of these stories runs in every edition.我们只是改变他们的顺序。 But a three-way cover split creates a lot of work for our designers.

;
;
;
;
;
;
;

;American share prices are up by 21% since the end of October and stand roughly 5% above their peak in January 2022. On February 22nd Europe's equities set a new record for the first time in two years. Even ;Japanese stocks; have nosed past the record in 1989 that preceded many years of slump. Our task was to explain what was behind this bull market and what comes next.

;

;There's no getting round the fact that markets are scarily high.自 1929 年华尔街崩盘以来，美国排名前 10% 的公司的价值占整个市场的比例还没有达到如此极端。在金融市场最泡沫的角落，比特币的交易价格再次达到 6 万美元左右，仅略低于 6 万美元。 its peak in 2021. How much further could prices rise?

;

;In our first cover we had one bull up where the air is thin, peering over a snow-capped mountain peak. In our second, we had another up to its horns in stratocumulus.

;

;You might be expecting a crash.然而，这种繁荣得到了技术乐观主义的支持，至少目前看来，这并不像 ChatGPT 式的幻觉。 2022 年 10 月，就在 OpenAI 发布其如今广受赞誉的聊天机器人之前，领先的 AI 芯片制造商 Nvidia 每个季度的毛利润约为 30 亿美元。 In the three months to the end of January 2024 it earned $17bn.

;

;Our third cover tried stacking our title above the clouds, while our third showed a bull suspended by balloons. In the end, we brought them together for our final cover.

;

;Under realistic assumptions about valuations, interest rates and taxes, America's firms will need to increase their underlying profits by around 6% every year to keep the stock boom going.这将接近他们战后最好的表现。这并不意味着股价即将崩盘。 The balloons could pop one by one in a gentle bear market that takes years to reverse.

;;Leader: ;;How to build a British voter
;;;Britain:; ;A changing British electorate is propelling Labour toward victory
;;;Interactive:; ;Can you build a British voter;;?;

;;
;

;In Britain our model calculates the probability that a voter will pick a political party based on eight characteristics, from their age and educational attainment to their ethnicity and the kind of property they live in. (You can see how people like you might vote by playing with the model ;here;.) It shows what is driving people away from the Tories and towards Labour.
;
;We wanted a cover that illustrates the scope for readers to build their own voter.

;

;If you play with the model you will discover that, whereas class was once the engine of British politics, it is now increasingly your date of birth. At the last general election, the age at which voters became more likely to support the Conservatives than Labour was 45. Our data show that at the next one this crossover age will be almost 70.

;
;
;
;
;
;
;

;Our first choice was a collage showing the diversity of Britain in the 2020s.我们使用了这个想法的一个版本来说明我们的报告，但对于封面来说，它并没有完全涵盖我们模型的“DIY”维度。翻页书更好，但有点有限。 In the end, we preferred a depiction of a snap-together electorate.

;

;The electoral coalition that Labour is stitching together is broad.它的核心选民是城市年轻人，但我们的模型显示，最强烈地反对保守党的人是居住在英格兰西北部、有抵押贷款的年长白人。 2019 年，这类选民有 81% 的机会投票给保守党。 The probability now is just 18%.

;

;There is a lesson here for Labour.该党很可能是由持不同观点的人选出的。 ;Bitter rows over the war in Gaza; show how such pressures might tug apart its electoral coalition.英国选民越来越有可能将他们的支持从一次选举转移到下一次选举。 Labour cannot assume it will have two terms to get things done.

;;Leader:; ;Stocks are booming. But their golden age is drawing to a close
;;;Finance and economics:; ;The good times for stockmarkets are unlikely to last;

;
;

;India is a ;rising economic power; but its politics veer into chauvinism and authoritarianism.发展和身份政治这两种相互竞争的趋势共同助长了第三种趋势：日益扩大的南北分歧。
;
;The wealthy south is where you will find the slick new India, with its startups, ;IT; campuses and gleaming iPhone-assembly plants. Yet Narendra Modi's Bharatiya Janata Party (;BJP;) gets a low share of its votes from there and relies on the poorer, more populous, rural, Hindi-speaking north.
;
;How the split is managed in the long run is of critical importance to India's prospects. Political and economic divisions could ruin India, but overcoming them could be the making of it.

;

;We started with a collage of Mr Modi, India's most powerful prime minister in decades. His face superimposed on a map of India is literally dividing the country.

;

;The south acts as India's economic engine, but its politics are on a separate planet from those of the north. For all Mr Modi's electoral triumphs, he still lacks a truly national mandate.

;

;Unfortunately, in this design Mr Modi looks disconcertingly like a cyborg. So we tried to illustrate the difference between north and south by having the Taj Mahal reflected as a factory.

;

;Yet this has problems, too.印度南部五个邦是初创企业和科技独角兽的所在地，而不是重工业的所在地。 Besides, the Taj Mahal is a Muslim tomb and Muslims are often a ;BJP; target.

;
;
;
;
;
;
;

;We settled here, with India poised between futures.悲观主义者担心莫迪会破坏宪法平衡。南方领导人已经指责他针对他们进行虚假的腐败调查，扣留中央政府资金，并提取不公平的税收来补贴北方。 Against the south's wishes, the ;BJP; could impose Hindi as the national language.

;

;India and Mr Modi have a better alternative. The ;BJP; could woo the south by moderating its Hindutva message, restraining its promotion of Hindi and focusing on economic development.

;

;We tried the tiger on a black background.尽管印度的形状更加清晰，但整个事情都非常柔和。 Amid booming markets and an excitable British electorate, we opted for a more optimistic green.
